reviews.review_msg: An amazing prof, incredibly caring and a fair marker. David does an incredible job catering to each student's needs and makes himself available for non-course related things as well. I asked David to be an academic reference for me and he was more than happy to be one. The most caring prof, highly recommend.

One of the best instructors I have ever had! The man not only knows how to teach but is an expert in emotional intelligence; he certainly has a gift for communication. Besides being honoured to have studied under the supervision of someone with his abilities, David has helped inspire me to publish my work and I am forever grateful. Recommended!!

This class was actually great to take remotely. David encouraged discussion during class, provided valuable insights, selected fascinating books, and provided awesome feedback on papers. Very kind and made sure to check in with students and be understanding of difficulites due to Covid. Please take a class with David, you won't regret it!

I honestly wish I had more time at SFU just so I could have more classes with David. Easily the best professor I've had in my whole undergrad. Very caring and considerate of his students. He's also super approachable if you need help, feedback, or just want to chat. Made online learning during COVID actually enjoyable and non-stressful.

David is super knowledgeable and one of the kindest professors Ive met at SFU. He emailed each of us in the middle of the term just to check in and see how were doing. The feedback he gave on our assignments are also really helpful and super detailed. He made IS451 as enjoyable as it can be and made the most out of our zoom sessions!
